GSD.description:
usbnet: sanity check for maxpacket

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15 by commit 397430b50a363d8b7bdda00522123f82df6adc5e. For more details please see the references link.
